title: 3 and Out - Belichick ATL TNF Beatdown, Mac Jones Hype Check, Zach Wilson Bust Watch, Week 11 Preview, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Belichick ATL TNF Beatdown, Mac Jones Hype Check, Zach Wilson Bust Watch, Week 11 Preview, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to Bill Belichick and Patriots systematic beatdown of the Falcons, how far New England can go with their limitations, why the Mac Jones hype is out of control, why head coach money has boomed more than ever recently, and why the Jets starting Joe Flacco makes zero sense. He also previews the top NFL week 11 games, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates! Check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
